en.delete_note_single: Are you sure you want to remove this note?
en.delete_note_multiple: Are you sure you want to remove these notes?
en.undo_changes_long: Are you sure you want to undo changes made to this note?
en.new_file_long: Are you sure you want to create a new file? Any unsaved changes will be lost.
en.open_file_long: Are you sure you want to load this file?
en.overwrite_file: Are you sure you want to overwrite %{file}?
en.exit_desc: Are you sure you want to close the program? Any unsaved changes will be lost.
